title: Leading for Impact: Engineering at the speed of AI
text:
TechCrunch was proud to host MongoDB at Disrupt 2025 in San Francisco. Here’s an overview of their Breakout session.

Gone are the days when business-first CEOs dominated early-stage ventures—today’s breakout startups are often shaped by engineering founders who take a hands-on, product-focused approach to solving complex problems. This panel of leaders from Factory, Fireworks, and Runlayer examined how technical skills are central to startup leadership, how to influence a company’s trajectory, and what capabilities founders should develop to position their startups—and themselves—for long-term success.

Presented by:
